alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 10:32PM EDT until September 08 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NEW CASTLE...NORTHWESTERN SALEM...NORTHWESTERN GLOUCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN CHESTER...SOUTHWESTERN PHILADELPHIA AND DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 1032 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Talleyville, or 7 miles northwest of Wilmington, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Wilmington, West Chester, Chester, Yeadon, Westtown, Carneys Point, Downingtown, Folcroft, Swarthmore, Paulsboro, Kennett Square, Penns Grove, National Park, East Lansdowne, Swedesboro, Arden, Darby Township, Cheyney and Talleyville. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 310 and 318. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 15. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 14 and 23. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 345 and 349. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 4 and 18. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
